      • stringInUpper

        public java.lang.String stringInUpper(java.lang.String[] a)
        Allows for user string input. Also checks the user input against an array of acceptable inputs, and returns an error message if the input is not one of the desired inputs
        Parameters:
        a - - list of acceptable inputs
        Returns:
        String -the verified input
